question.title: How do I enumerate an enum?

comments.text: It might be easiest just to use `Enum.GetValues(typeof(Suit)).Cast<Suit>()`. That will give you an `IEnumerable<Suit>`.
It might be easiest just to use `Enum.GetValues(typeof(Suit)).Cast<Suit>()`. That will give you an `IEnumerable<Suit>`.
